thread.title: SRK suffers heart attack, hospitalized
thread.title_full: SRK suffers heart attack, hospitalized - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: SRK suffers heart attack, hospitalized
text:
Here's news that has come as concern. Century Star Shivarajkumar was admitted to hospital today as he suffered from a mild heart attack. The actor was rushed to Mallya Hospital.
According to sources, the actor was working out in the gym as usual, where he collapsed. After being rushed to the hospital, it was revealed that Shivanna had actually suffered a mild heart attack. His wife Geetha and her brother Madhu Bangarappa are said to be with the actor in hospital.
